abstract: Turkish court sentences teacher to almost year in prison for making rude gesture at Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan during 2014 political rally; Turkey defines insults toward public officials as crime.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Turkey: Teacher Jailed for Gesture

snippet: A court on Wednesday sentenced a teacher to almost a year in prison for making a rude gesture at President Recep Tayyip Erdogan during a political rally in 2014.
lead_paragraph: A court on Wednesday sentenced a teacher to almost a year in prison for making a rude gesture at President Recep Tayyip Erdogan during a political rally in 2014.
